sent.orig: If governments impose simple and crude management against these and behavior, governmental credibility will be harmed.
sent.trans: 如果政府在对待这类事件当中采取简单粗暴手段，其公信力肯定会受到伤害。

sent.orig: It is impossible to impose our wishes on somebody else.
sent.trans: 政府正贯彻一项新的政策采帮助失业者。

sent.orig: Manyinterpret that to mean the government will impose caste-based hiring quotas.
sent.trans: 许多人把它解读为政府将要实施种姓雇佣配额制度。

sent.orig: But he says it is a mistake simply to translate or impose Western ethical standards.
sent.trans: 但是他说，单纯的移植或采用西方的道德标准是个错误。

sent.orig: And that, insurers and patient advocates say, could impose a considerable financial burden.
sent.trans: 而且，保险公司和病人权益保护者认为，这会给他们一个相当重的经济负担。
